column4: Can someone help me? I am using initramfs to mount my ubuntu partition so I can edit a configuration file.. I am not sure what syntax I should use for mount to make it read/write. Any ideas?
Can someone help me? I am using initramfs to mount my ubuntu partition so I can edit a configuration file.. I am not sure what syntax I should use for mount to make it read/write. Any ideas?
